name: Zenith A10 Hydraulic Utility Hylo Table
descr:
A10-Zenith Hydraulic Utility Hylo w/auto-cocking drops

Standard Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Tilt Headpiece; Adjustable Width
Face Paper Toweling & Dispenser
Soft Hinged Dorsal
Swingaway Abdominal- Adjustable Tension
Auto-Cocking Pneumatic Pelvic Drop
Slide & Crank Pelvic
Adjustable Front Section
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion
Sensation Upholstery 
Sure Step Footswitch
Platinum Base Color
Table Specifications:
Length 89”
Height 22” (optional 24”, 26”, or 28")
Width 24”
Weight 370 lbs.
